title: Another Mind-Blowing   Connection (Ep 1192)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest garbage from the lying Democrats about the Trump administration’s handling of the Coronavirus threat. I also address the reappearance of this key Spygate player as the scandal continues to grow. 
News Picks:

Unbelievable! Christopher Steele is still defending his garbage dossier. 


This 2019 article provides additional background on why Anthony Ferrante is defending the dossier. 

Rod Rosenstein was knee-deep in the Spygate scandal and new documents make the case. 

Telling the media where to go is my specialty.

Lt. General Flynn is seeking exoneration in the witch hunt against him. 


Even the AP is calling BS on the Trump administration’s response to the Coronavirus.
